sql_fr_run: with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_lake.dagg_cdit_redist sa join com_us_lake.man_lov lv on sa.product_name = lv.lov_code where sa.gl_date between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'dagg_cdit_redist') and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'dagg_cdit_redist') and upper(LOV_DESCRIPTION)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'dagg_cdit_redist') prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp

with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_lake.cnp_bd_cbk_sls sa join com_us_lake.man_lov lv on sa.product_name = lv.lov_code where sa.gl_date between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'cnp_bd_cbk_sls') and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'cnp_bd_cbk_sls') and upper(LOV_DESCRIPTION)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'cnp_bd_cbk_sls') prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp

with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt, 'Unit' as field_name from com_us_lake.udef_ic_order_adjustments sa join com_us_lake.man_lov lv on sa.product = lv.lov_code where sa.gl_date between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'udef_ic_order_adjustments') and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'udef_ic_order_adjustments') and upper(LOV_DESCRIPTION)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'udef_ic_order_adjustments') prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp

with tmp (select abs((cur_cnt-prv_cnt)/metric*100) as metric from (select count(1) as cur_cnt,  'Unit' as field_name from com_us_lake.BPRI_BillingExtract bill JOIN com_us_lake.bpri_salesordertransactions sal ON (regexp_replace(sal.doc_number, '^0+(?!$)', '') = regexp_replace(bill.Sales_document,'^0+(?!$)', '') AND regexp_replace(sal.s_ord_item, '^0+(?!$)', '') = regexp_replace(bill.Sales_doc_Item, '^0+(?!$)','')) INNER JOIN com_us_lake.bpri_materialmasterdata mat ON (sal.material=mat.material) join com_us_lake.man_lov lv on regexp_replace(mat.material, '^0+(?!$)', '') = lv.lov_code where to_date(bill.Billing_doc__date, 'MM/dd/yy') between (select min(period_start_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'bpri_salesordertransactions') and (select max(period_end_date) from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'bpri_salesordertransactions') and upper(LOV_DESCRIPTION)='HEMATOLOGY') cur cross join (select prv_count as prv_cnt, metric, field_name from com_us_lake.dq_count_table where dq_rule = 'dq_rule_1' and table_name = 'bpri_salesordertransactions') prv on cur.field_name=prv.field_name) select * from tmp
Select case when metric > threshold then 1 else 0 end as res from dq_output_table where entity_id in (101,102,103,104)
